name: Star Wars: Movie Battles II
description:
Movie Battles II is a fast-paced, action packed mod for the award winning Jedi Knight Jedi Academy game, that lets players play and fight in the most iconic battles seen throughout the entire saga!
Choose from a range of 12 distinct classes, each with their own strengths, weapons, and abilities. Play on over 40 maps from across the Star Wars universe, inspired by scenarios in the movies and legends.

name: Railway: Koko ni Aru Yume
description:
A small port town with mountains on the back and the sea in the front. Main character returns to this town for the first time in 8 years after leaving it because of parents divorce.
Now grandmother invites him to help with the coffee shop "Railway" that got its name due to being set up at an abandoned train locomotive on the outskirts of the town.
Meeting old friends, recovering old memories... it's a place where dreams come true.

name: Hauma: A Detective Noir Story - Prologue
description: Hauma is a deduction visual novel set in Munich. Discover a conspiracy amongst the upper echelons of society alongside former detective Judith, while visiting real locations in a comic-inspired look. This is a free prologue of the full game.

name: Blue-Sky-Blue(s): Sora o Mau Tsubasa
description:
The protagonist's mom passed away 10 years ago and the father-son relationship is a strained one. When poppy's work as a weatherman and new marriage sends them to Hokkaido, the player enters a new school and joins up with a group of student's whose passion is the sky - with the belief that people come from the sky and will eventually return to the sky...

Six girls are available for the romancing including honor student Kasumi Itimatsu, school director's granddaughter Fuuka Mitsuba and assistant teacher Tomomi Shinose.

name: Tenshi-tachi no Gogo IV: Yuuko
description:
The Catholic high school for girls, St. Sophia, has a reputation of a very traditional establishment with strict rules. However, there are also rumors that after midnight, something mysterious happens to the school, and everything inside it changes... When the protagonist, a substitute teacher, arrives at St. Sophia for a three months teaching job, he quickly discovers that the behavior of the school inhabitants is anything but compatible with the Christian morals...

Tenshitachi no Gogo 4, like most other games in the series, is a fresh start story-wise; from gameplay point of view, it plays just like its predecessors: it is a traditional Japanese adventure, without puzzles and with menu-based interactions, with verb commands and sub-menus of objects. Usually the game allows the player to advance only upon depletion of all the possible commands. There are, however, right and wrong decisions, including story branches that will end in a Game Over.

name: Don't Scream
description:
If you scream, you restart. Don't Scream is an Unreal Engine 5 short horror experience inspired by '90s camcorder found footage. Made by two indie devs. The challenge is simple: explore the mysterious Pineview Forest for 18 minutes without screaming.

Sounds easy, right? But there's a catch. Time only progresses as you move, and you cannot predict the scares. You must calibrate your microphone in-game so that every whimper, jump, or even a minor squeak is registered as a scream, increasing the challenge. With dozens of dynamic scares, each playthrough offers a unique experience.

name: Witcharoo
description: Your life as a cat is turned upside down after being kidnapped by a crazy witch..!

name: Perfect Dark PC Port
description: An unofficial port of the N64 game Perfect Dark to PC using a decompilation of that game.

name: Tunnel Vision
description:
Take control of Suoni V Linnet
(choice of voice & pronouns)
In this eerie, atmospheric, narrative-driven horror adventure made in 1 month for Spooktober VN Jam 2023.

name: Beach de Reach! DS
description: Full remake of the original game with redone graphics.

name: Dorghael Arhlannen
description: Medium-sized ikwhite-themed temple with nice gameplay and a boss-fight.

name: Forgotten Valley
description: Turok-themed levels with custom textures. Comes with a music track and the map source is included.

name: The C.G.L Project
description: Short arena-style map themed and timed to a techno music track.

name: Un Lugar Otro Que El Cielo
description: Large abstract floating ikwhite level. Comes with a new model, sounds, a custom skybox and a music track. The map source is included.

name: The Dreamer's Demesne
description: Medium-sized blue desert castle, made for Arcane Dimensions v1.81+

name: Apinaraivo
description: Large and exessively detailed IKbase level using some SOA entities and the Mega-Enforcer.

name: Arrogant Erratum & The Kuras Stronghold
description: Two medium/large blue-themed maps plus a start map and a battle arena, featuring elements from some of the original Quake levels and certain old custom maps. Comes with three music tracks. The map sources are included.

name: One Thousand Cuts
description: Expanded standalone version of sock's map from Func Map Jam 2: a medium-sized, IKblue-themed, partially ruined temple with two individual routes for replayablility. It comes with a set of medieval-style item boxes.

name: Precipice Continuum
description: A large outdoor/canyon map with temple ruins.

name: Coagula
description: Small Metal space floater. Origin of the well-known Coagula style (tight space maps requiring the player to work his way upward).

name: Coagula2: Flesh
description: Small Metal space level.

name: Winterpack 2005-2006
description: Two maps build from the scraps of other mappers: Hrimfaxi used Drew's scraps for a large egyptian/mayan map called "Egyptian rhapsody!" Zwiffle used czg's for a ikblue map called "Teacups - are my intentions".

name: Avanipaala Praasaada
description:
An elegant map in a unique texture theme (a white version of ikblue) with some nice brushwork and good exploration/secrets.
Memorable primarily for its Taj-Mahal-like ambience, but also fun to play.

name: Infinite Arcana
description:
Infinite Arcana is an action Roguelike mobile game with a fantasy adventure theme.
Fist to flesh, heart-piercing fighting, you may enjoy the best action experience.
Randomly generated maps and monsters, endless floating isles to be explored;
Interesting game modes with random character skill builds more than 100 styles.
The mystery of "Infinite Arcana" is waiting to be unraveled, and the eroded continent is calling for your rescue.

name: Chaotic Trinity
description: Around medium-sized level using developer textures; a test map for AD's Chaos mode. The map source and the texture wad are included.

name: The Tenacious Tentacle
description: Small level created in the spirit of the 100b competitions (using not more than 100 world brushes). The map source is included.

name: Metal Monstrosity
description: Medium-sized vertical runic metal structures floating in the clouds. The map features enemies of the Base variety and has an integrated skill selection area. Additionally, it comes with a custom skybox as well as a few new sounds. The map source is included in the PAK.

name: Q-Deck
description: Small, highly-detailed base map. The (expanded) singleplayer version of DMQDeck. The map source is included.

name: The Terracotta Terror
description: Small terracotta-colored Coagula-style space map.

name: The Ivory Tower
description: Medium-sized medieval towers in a mine canyon with many secret areas that allow for somewhat nonlinear gameplay, a built-in skill selection area, and custom medieval-themed items. The map source is included in the pak.

name: Midnight Stalker
description: Medium-sized metal dungeon in E3M6 mashup style with a built-in skill selection room. It also features custom item boxes. The map source is included in the PAK.

name: Retro Jam 2
description: Speedy map jam following the theme "Fantasy brick cities in the skies": three floating maps by Skacky, Sock and RickyT23. It comes with optional medieval-style item models.

name: Retro Jam 3
description: Third retro map jam: two "Vertical metal / runic"-themed maps by FifthElephant and skacky. The map sources are included in the pak.

name: Retro Jam 3 DLC
description: Three vertical metal/runic-themed maps - late entries to Retro Jam 3, ironically labeled "DLC". The map sources are included.

name: In The Shadows
description: Demo version of an atmospheric singleplayer campaign with three small medieval levels (two of which are remakes of the orignal E1M1 and E1M2). It features both normal gameplay and a new, very unique stealth mode. The enemy AI has been vastly improved, and there are countless visual overhauls and miscellaneous additions. Very high quality throughout. A full version was never completed.

name: Castle Kaahoo
description: Small temple map using Kaahoo textures. A touched-up and expanded version of sock's entry from SM175.

name: Castle Zanthu
description: Medium-sized castle using Daikatana E3 textures. Comes with a custom skybox and a poster screenshot.

name: 1024 Units
description: 1024 units / 6 SP maps / Artistical, DraQu, JCR, muk0r, onetruepurple, ww

name: Unknown Kadath
description: Medium-sized 'classic-style' medieval level with a church and lava-filled caverns beneath

name: The Cobalt Palace
description: Small blue Metal map with easy gameplay but a very unique style.

name: Perish the Thoth
description: Large underground Egyptian vault.

name: Malvirta Station
description: Small to medium id-base level with traps. Vanilla Quake version of the SM209 entry.

name: Bunker of Barzai
description: Medium-sized metal/runic dungeon; uses a few custom textures.

name: Off Base
description: Around medium-sized idbase map.

name: The Circulation of Shadows
description: Large underground industrial base with rocket silos and conveyor belts; and a small start map. It was originally started in 2005 for a Nehahra addon episode. It uses Daikatana textures and runs on the Rubicon 2 mod (included), featuring new and modified enemies and effects. Also comes with a music track and a custom skybox.

name: Gomenne Angel: Yokohama Monogatari
description: One day the hero picks up a notebook and it turns out to be a possession of a girl student of St. Francis girls academy where his fiance is teaching. All three of them meet in a cafe, but girl looks very anxious. Her sister disappeared. And we'll help to find her.

name: Bug & Seek
description: Catch bugs and clues in this cozy bug-catching simulator, styled like an 8-bit classic. You’ve bought the local bug museum, abandoned after a mysterious robbery. Fill orders, build your collection, and upgrade your skills and equipment while exploring Buggburg and uncovering its secrets.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Reserve Cosmetics Bundle 1
description: Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with these unique cosmetics inspired by Medved-Taiga National Park, Vurhonga Savanna Reserve, and Parque Fernando. All in one bundle!

name: Forza Motorsport: Deluxe Edition
description: Race over 500 real-world cars including modern race cars and more than 100 cars new to Forza Motorsport. Make every lap count across 20 living environments with fan-favorite locations and multiple track layouts to master, each featuring live on-track scoring, fully dynamic time-of-day with weather and unique driving conditions that ensure no two laps ever look or play the same.

name: Mutant Football League: Complete Bundle
description: This is the ultimate bundle for the complete Mutant Football League collection and your ticket to the most outrageous, hilarious, and brutal parody of professional American football. 7-on-7 arcade-style, football extravaganza where bloodthirsty superstar players hit the gridiron to battle it out in the most violent game ever played!

name: Moving Out 2: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Terraformers: Supporter Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Forza Motorsport: Premium Add-Ons Bundle
description: Xbox Game Pass members, upgrade your racing experience in Forza Motorsport and Forza Horizon 5 with this unmissable offer. The Premium Add-Ons Bundle* includes Car Packs, VIP Memberships, in-game credits, and more content for both games.

name: Sword Art Online: Last Recollection - Digital Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage & Assassin's Creed Valhalla Bundle
description:
Play the two latest installments of the iconic Assassin's Creed franchise with Assassin's Creed Mirage and Assassin's Creed Valhalla.

Assassin's Creed Mirage: Experience the story of Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions, seeking answers and justice as he navigates the bustling streets of ninth-century Baghdad. Through a mysterious, ancient organization known as the Hidden Ones, he will become a deadly Master Assassin and change his fate in ways he never could have imagined.

Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Become Eivor, a legendary Viking warrior raised on tales of battle and glory. Explore England’s Dark Ages as you raid your enemies, grow your settlement, and build your political power in a quest to earn your place in Valhalla.

name: Street Drag Racing: Car Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Corruption: Political Simulator Strategy
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Guttang Gottong
description: A fun railway trip!

name: Are you yet Living?
description: Medium sized, somewhat nonlinear map using Knave textures.

name: Moldy Tower
description: A medium-sized vertical map. It starts with a moldy green area from which you ascend into a mechanical exploratory part. After surpassing this you are awarded a tense boss fight. Lots of novel atmospheric effects thanks to the use of Quoth.

name: The Living End & Elder World Waystation
description: Two-map SP unit: a large medieval dungeon in an underground lava cave (using rtGnosis textures), and a medium sized IKbase-themed stargate facility. It comes with a couple of new sounds and a custom skybox.

name: 4 hours
description: Maps made in 4 hours or less / 9 SP maps / dantescanline, Danzadan, dumptruck_ds, ing-ing, JCR, Naitelveni, Newhouse, prengle

name: Coagula Mappack #3
description:
Results of the third Coagula Contest (mid-2009):
Six small space maps by ericw, Golden boy, RickyT23, spy, Trinca, Willem, and a start map by nonentity. Some of them come with the map source and optional skyboxes.

name: Nastrond
description: Very large and detailed Knave fortress.

name: Solarfall
description: Large Wizard/Ebon Fortress level. Comes with a start map.

name: Elements
description: Medium-sized medival level with distinctly themed areas for each element, and classic gameplay. A skybox and the map source are included.

name: The Elder Reality
description: Medium-sized Elder World-style map that features at least one room from each level in the fourth episode of Quake (except for E4M1). An expanded version of the author's Retro Jam 4 entry.

name: The Lair of DOOMestic Animals
description: Small Metal/runic level. A polished and extended version of PuLSaR's SM57 map.

name: Remaster Textures
description: Nine small / medium maps made in a week using MachineGames' new textures for the rerelease. A variety of themes and styles, has something for everyone.

name: The Rats in the Walls
description: Small oldschool brick level with a few DOOM textures.

name: Crescendo Of Dreams + Surmounting Terror
description: Medium sized green DOOM marble/ wood level with a small end battle map.

name: Candles of the Damned
description: Remake of E1M2 from Quake: a medium-sized medieval castle with many candles. The map was previously released as part of Halloween Jam 2. Among other things, this version features even more candles! Comes with a new bat model and some ambient sounds.

name: The Lima Project
description: Medium-sized industrial facility using cr8 and Doom 3 textures. It comes with a custom skybox and a music track.

name: Deep Research
description: Small base map using Speedbase textures. Comes with a new skybox and a custom music track.

name: The Vigil
description: Small Medieval map with focus on arena combat.

name: Subterranean Siege
description: Evolved from a speedmapping session, this is a large-ish Q1SP decked out mainly in IDbase textures with plenty of natural rocky sections. A chain map by Misyu, Vigil, necros and Xen. The map source is included.

name: At the Gates of Midian
description: Two maps: a large Metal/Wood fortress in the mountains and a small end battle arena, featuring some modified Fiends and Shamblers. Conveys a certain DOOM-like atmosphere.

name: The Coagula Contest
description: This contest was run mid-September to mid-November of 2001, with the goal of creating maps in the tradition of Tim Elek's 'Coagula' series of maps - a series of structures floating in the void. There were 5 entries: Tronyn(2), Fat Controller, Dilvish, and Necros. In addition, a start map created by Tronyn is included, as well as the original Coagula series by Tim Elek.

name: Perception
description: Medium sized Egypt-style temple in a canyon.

name: Coagula3: Bone
description: Small blue/red space level using Daikatana textures.

name: Bit Orchard: Animal Valley - Ultra Ultimate
description: Sin descripción

name: Varenje: Don't Touch The Berries
description: Sin descripción

name: Fashion Girls: All in One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Rush GT: Prime Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Superb Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Shitataru Ano Ko: Drenched Girls
description: Secretly? Forcibly? Agreement? The mischievous school life to see drenched girls begins!

name: Machigai-sagashi Daisousasen
description: Sin descripción

name: Corruption Catharsis: Try To Act Normal
description: The ranger has been called to Ranger Station Theta as a precaution as scientists there have reported an anomaly with their slip-tech that would indicate a malevolant force has been trying to exploit the station. They could get a handle on the slip gate interdimensional array and use it as a back-door that would allow them to take control of some of Earth's remote facilities. Your breifing was to investigate the disturbance and eradicate any compromised forces or opposition that you encounter.

name: Quarantine
description: Medium sized base map.

name: Stark Monstrosity
description: A rather unlinear huge base map with outdoor parts.

name: Slave to a Machine
description: A large tech/industrial base map using Daikatana, Doom3 and Half-Life textures.

name: The Hand That Feeds You
description: Large, interconnected base in the mountains with a lava cave beneath. It comes with a custom skybox.

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero Haneda - Allstars
description: Sin descripción

name: Three Towers And A Sick Base
description: Large open base map set inside a lava canyon.

name: Fushigi Dagashiya Sentendou: Fushigi Dagashiya-banashi 50-sen
description: Sin descripción

name: Tensei Isekai RPG kara no Dasshutsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Kindan no Shinrei Shashin
description: Sin descripción

name: The Coagula Contest 2
description:
Results of the second Coagula contest
1st: tyrcoag: Outside In - Tyrann
2nd: pushcoag: The Vertical Mile - Pushplay
3rd: nesp10: Embers of Cruelty - necros
4th: jesus: Jesus Wants You - [anon]
4th: discoag2: Usher Recompiled - distrans
6th: chain3: Indigo - Chainer

name: Halloween Games for Toddlers and Babies
description:
This is a funny Halloween educational game for children. Hold the diapers ready.
The game features different kind of learning peg puzzles, where kids can learn about shapes, form, sizes, colors and they can collect stars to unlock an additional find the pairs memo game, where they can play against a virtual animal cat opponent. All games feature safe for children exclusive funny Halloween illustrations, animations and sounds.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Fujidou Ryuunosuke Tantei Nikki Vol.3 - Ruiiro no Suiren: Gosai Ryuudensetsu Renzoku Satsujin-jiken
description: Sin descripción

name: G-Mode Archives+: Saiko Mystery Series vol. 4 - Innocent Noise
description: Sin descripción

name: Remix Map Pack
description:
Results of the 2008 remix competition at Func_Msgboard: five remixes/remakes of original id maps.
e2m1rmx by Spirit
e3m4rmx by Willem
e3m5rmx by Speedy
e4m1rmx by RickyT23
e4m7rmx by Zwiffle

name: Grendel's Keep
description: Medium-sized dark runic metal/base style biomatter processing facility. A sort of prequel to the Travail missionpack (which is required to play).

name: Ruined Nation
description: Medium-sized base map using Doom 3 textures. It comes with a number of custom ambient sounds and features hard combat.

name: Temple of Teuthis v1
description: Large dark underwater base / temple adventure map with lots of exploration. Textures by Makkon, built on extras_r5 mod by Khreathor (already included) with features like ladders. Make sure to save often, and save powerups until you really need them.

name: White Room
description: Medium sized base map with a unique concept: "keep the usual shapes but take away the textures." A biohazard outbreak at this facility adds lots of blood to the mostly white textures.

name: The Lizard's Trance
description: A remix of id's e2m5 in Q3 gothic textures and bigger scale. Beautiful architecture and solid gameplay.

name: Explore or Die
description: Around medium sized base map with Cr8 textures and somewhat non-linear gameplay relying on exploration (for ammo). Comes with a custom skybox and support for colored lighting.

name: Cogs Of Conflict
description: A nicely designed metal map with experimental gameplay. Instead of fighting the monsters directly, the player has to take a more stealth-based approach and lure them into traps.

name: Evil Exhumed
description: Medium sized Base map with an excarvation site, a library and a secret lab.

name: Dimension of the Doomed
description: Medium-sized base/wizard map where two Quake dimensions clash.

name: Thirteen Tombs of the Brilliant Dynasty
description: Large medieval dark fantasy castle in frozen lands with haunted crypt. A late entry for Twisted Christmas Jam 2022. Built for Arcane Dimensions v1.81+

name: The Warden
description: Large underground castle / medieval sewer map in the style of Honey. Requires Arcane Dimensions v1.81+ Custom music is "Only Child" by Julia Kent

name: Smells Like Rust
description: A big base map with intense fights... you are a treasure hunter who seeks riches in abandoned places. You heard about a factory that did brutal tests on people and decide to go there to see if there's anything left.

name: Atrocity Arise
description: Large Knave-textured castle with libraries and a courtyard. The map source is included.

name: Disengage the Simulator
description: Smallish slaughter-map "simulation" in a DE_DUST (from Counter Strike) setting, complete with dead terrorists and plantable bombs. Comes with custom textures, models, and sounds. The map source and a texture wad are included.

name: Tomb of Fenrir
description: Medium to large medieval-style dungeon in a subterranean lava cave. The map source and the texture wad are included.

name: The Faults Within
description: Remake/remix of stock Quake map E3M2 - The Vaults of Zin. The map source is included.

name: A Horse Named Quake
description: Small vertical medieval courtyard with a built-in skill selection room. The map source is included.

name: Sunken Fallacy
description: Medium-sized flooded Aztec / Mesoamerican ruins (Koohoo) map with a few puzzles and "cheeky" combat, built on Progs Dump 3 (already included). QuakeC and map source is included. Custom music by Patrick Patrikios.

name: Violent Rumble
description: Community mapping event organized at 4chan's retro videogame board: 11 large levels including a start map and a secret map, following a variety of styles and texture themes. They run on a custom mod that combines enemies, weapons, items and assets from both official mission packs, Quoth, Arcane Dimensions, RMQ and Progs_dump. As such, it comes with many new models, sounds as well as skyboxes and custom music tracks.

name: Somewhere
description: Episode with six medium-sized levels including a start map and a boss map. Each level follows an individual textures theme/style: a base, a metal/runic sewer, an Ebon castle, a stone/brick fortress, and a void map.

name: Root of all Evil: Infernal Science - Part 1
description: Large underground research facility.

name: Root of all Evil: Infernal Science - Part 2
description: Second part of Root of all Evil. A large underground research facility.

name: Ayakashi Princess: Prequel
description: The fox princess's great adventure! A story from a little while ago. Tamamo Hime wakes up in the Ayakashi world, ``Kakuriyo.'' She makes her way home, feeling a bit uncomfortable. Explore various stages and move forward with graceful actions! Is this world a dream or...

name: Cat Detective
description: The plot is based on a main case linked to several unit cases. Fiona's a psychic. She spent over a decade hiding her identity. Living the daily life of a student and as a detective looking for the truth with pets.

name: Toraware Hotel
description: A world where humans and beastmen coexist. A secluded hotel exclusively for beastmen deep in the mountains. An incident occurs on a night when everyone has gone to sleep... Whether you can safely return from the hotel depends on your choices.

name: GorillaCraft
description: This is a 3d action game. Find your enemies in difficult mazes, duel with shocking bosses, decapitate them in a flash of swords, and earn your honor! I came, I saw, I conquered! Chief, it’s time to pick up your sword and start your journey!

name: Zero Vortex
description: Get lost in the mind-bending world of Zero Vortex, a retro 6DOF shooter. Navigate disorienting levels, upgrade weapons, and face off against diverse enemies. Immerse yourself in mixed modern-retro graphics and an all-new soundtrack. Prepare for chaos!

name: Venator
description: Dive into a retro Action RPG odyssey set in ancient Rome. As Titus, hunt spectral evils in a quest for revenge. Sail the haunted Mediterranean, face mythical monsters, and unravel mysteries from beyond the veil. A storm of vengeance brews; Rome's shadows beckon you forth.

name: Veil of Shadows
description: Veil of Shadows is an action-adventure with roguelite elements, echoing the vibes of classics from the past. Explore the surroundings to understand what's happening to Sirene. With the essence of retro games, face monsters, complete quests to gain experience, and evolve, preparing for the journey.

name: Wasted: Will Be Brutal
description: A Survival Open World PVE/PVP

name: Wheels of Duty
description: Fight Against other players online across multiple locations with multiple game modes. Get in your wheelchairs and fulfill your duty as soldiers!

name: Wheels of Duty: Survival Modes
description: Team up with up to 4 people and take on AI attackers in Survival Modes

name: Wild Card Football: Legacy Players Kickoff Pack
description: Play as famed legacy players such as Barry Sanders, Walter Payton, Jerry Rice, and Dan Marino and their unique throwback outfits.

name: Wild Card Football: Ultimate Outfit Pack
description: The Ultimate Outfit Pack includes ten legendary cosmetic outfits that are each unique outfits that add style to any team and can match your team colors.

name: Stranded
description: Explore, collect and build in this action roguelike, create bases, hire allies, evolve your character and level up as far as you can handle!

name: Steel Circuit
description: In "Steel Circuit" You control a resilient robot on a mission to overthrow a malevolent rogue AI. Craft potent weaponry, battle enemy robots, and explore the facility to reclaim it for unseen benefactors. Beware, death comes at a high price!

name: Substitute Priest
description: Welcome to [REDACTED], our lovely village. Get acquainted with our community, pray for a bit, and let's go. Meet our newly acquired priest and get rid of your sins as quickly as possible. PS: We advise you not to stay outside buildings after 9:00 p.m.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Landscapes 4
description: Puzzles of landscapes!

name: Tempest: Tower of Probatio
description: Tempest: Tower of Probatio presents a new standard for those who are bored with card games that use the same deck every time and take more than 10 minutes. The collective card game Tempest: Tower of Probatio, which is incredibly simple and unimaginably strategic! Comming Soon!

name: The Semen Donation Truck!
description: Two succubus invite you to donate your semen using the condoms they provide. If you beat their record in the Whack-O-Mole minigame, they also gladly provide physical help in your endeavor at donating.

name: The Rubro Rose's Castle
description: For centuries, an ancient family has ruled the lands of the morbid and decadent province of Rubro Rose, but with the sudden illness of the lord of Vorkrom Castle, everything falls upon the young princess of pale skin...

name: Temple of the Green Moon
description: Temple of the Green Moon is a psychological thriller that will send you into the heart of a mystical journey full of mysteries and incredible discoveries.

name: Total Gravity
description: Navigate cosmic chaos, altering bullet trajectories in epic space battles. Forge alliances, uncover secrets, and fight back to save your besieged home planet.

name: This Game Is Easy
description: This Game Is Easy is a game that challenges you. It will test and confuse you. Are you up to the challenge of this super-easy game?

name: The will of space
description: You can freely assemble a spaceship and shoot with a double joystick at the top view angle in the survival Roguelike game! Explore science fiction space and build your strongest battleship!

name: The Unknown Fear
description: The Unknown Fear is about a prisoner, sentenced to death, that had his memory deleted. His only chance of changing his life is by retrieving a file on the main computer of a secret settlement. Will you be able to get a new life or will the imprisoned creature in the settlement devour your body?

name: Curse of the Golden Skull Key
description: Large Wizard-themed level with big open water areas.

name: Godfreys Demesne
description: Medium-sized medieval castle level. It is based on the Progs_dump mod (included) and comes with some custom sounds and models.

name: East Ardougne
description: Medium-sized Knave fortress. It comes with a custom skybox and a music track. The map source is included.

name: Retribution Revisited
description: Small to medium-sized level (albeit with a high monster count). A singleplayer remake of Q3DM7- Temple of Retribution using custom textures. Comes with a music track. The map source is included.

name: Network Unreachable
description: Smallish industrial/base map using socktech textures. It comes with two new sound effects. The map source is included.

name: Secrets of the Keep
description: Huge town at nighttime with a castle and a big cathedral. It uses custom textures and comes with few new models, sounds, a custom skybox as well as a music track. The map source is included.

name: Corrupted Sector
description: Medium-sized base map. Comes with a few new sounds, a custom skybox and a music track. The map source is included.

name: Xala'noth: Part 1
description: Medium-sized level using GothicDM and Knave textures and featuring strong colored lighting. It comes with a start map, a custom skybox and a music track by the author.

name: Trench Foot
description: Smallish linear Mayan/Koohoo-textured dungeon.

name: Diminutive Abyss
description: Small void map with a focus on exploration.

name: Duel, In Towers

Mai is having an awful day. She just got fired, and suddenly two guys show up claiming to be Angels of Death, saying that she's going to die in seven days.

Not only that, but her soul will be destroyed completely, so she can't even be reincarnated.

The Angels can't prevent her death, but they want to at least help save her soul. They lend her their supernatural powers so she can help people -- just like a superhero.

Kenji was just a regular teenage boy who had a normal life, which included a girlfriend. However, everything changes when one day he comes home and discovers that his insane father has created a female cyborg. His previous attempts failed because he used an artificial brain; this time, to avoid this mistake, he takes out his son's brain and puts it into the cyborg. Poor Kenji gains a second life - as a beautiful artificial woman, whose task is to oppose a dubious world government organization.

Super Ultra Machine Cyborg Marilyn DX is an adventure game with very light RPG elements. The interaction is point-and-click; the cursor changes to icons corresponding to examining, talking, and exiting commands when placed upon an object on-screen (during sex scenes, the cursor may change to icons representing sexual actions). The player will also have to explore maze-like pseudo-3D dungeons, encountering enemies at pre-set points, and fighting them in simple one-on-one turn-based battles. The player character can use various moves, some of which deplete special energy bars, which can be replenished with items found in the dungeons. Enemies are mostly female and undress upon defeat. There are no equipment, money, or experience system of any kind.

Each stage consists of an action part and a mini-game part, and the score of the stage is the sum of the remaining HP at the time of clearing the action part and the score of the mini-game.

description: Small linear map in a runic style. Uses progs_dump (included) for a couple of enemy tweaks. Map source is included.

name: Mars Base Excavation Incident
description: Large Doom-style level using original Doom textures. It starts out in a remake/conversion of E1M1 and provides a journey through various base and underground/marble temple areas, effectively using a Doom-like layout. Comes with a custom skybox and a music track.

name: The Machinery
description: Large dark industrial map using IKbase textures. Comes with a custom music track by the author. The map source is included.

name: Keeper Of The Hell Gate
description: Medium-sized runic map. It is based on the progs_dump mod (included) and a few extra models and sounds as well as a music track by the author. The map source is included.

name: Rich Mahogany and Human Leather-Bound Books
description: Large castle library in the mountains. It uses some Knave textures and comes with a custom skybox.

name: Industrial Combat
description: Small Rubicon-style industrial level with a mine tunnels section.

name: The End of Solace
description: Large moldy blood dungeon "in the style of E1M3". The map source is included.

name: The Gateway to Hell
description: Small to medium-sized medieval / hell map, the sequel to Castle of the Dark Ages. Uses DKT and Doom3 textures, and comes with a few additional ambient sounds as well as a hell skybox.

name: Fort Driant
description: A huge military base in Half-Life/Doom style. The mission is to disable a reactor within. Comes with a few ambient sounds and a custom skybox.

name: Castle of The Dark Ages
description: Large, dark castle level with DKT3 textures.

name: Event Horizon
description: Big base map in Daikatana textures with objective-based gameplay.

name: The Contract
description: Medium-sized Knave-style flying cathedral with a courtyard and a crypt area. It comes with a start map and a custom skybox.

name: Morbidity: 1
description: Medium sized Base/Metal map. Uses some DOOM2 textures and some other custom ones.

name: Morbidity: 2
description: Small to medium custom Metal map with a Base bit at the beginning.

name: Daredevil's Descent & Cryogenic Crypt
description: Two large levels in Medieval/Metal/Wizard/Hipchurch style.

name: Halo Chaotic Edition
description: In this mod, all enemies and allies will multiply once they die, turning small fights into a real battlefield not to mention the amount of explosions that there will be!

name: Starship
description: Medium sized starship with all new custom textures, slightly tougher and reskinned monsters, and a few extra progs.

name: Hell in a Can
description: A medium sized cargo spacecraft with Zer and IKBase textures and somewhat unusual gameplay. There are three missions to be completed in which you'll face all kinds of problems, from technical difficulties to unruly 'cargo'.

name: The Forgotten Level
description: Medium sized Wizard map

name: The Fierce Livid
description: Large Metal windtunnel map

name: Rust in Peace
description: Medium sized original Metal-style windtunnel base map.

name: The NetherWorld
description: Medium sized Metal map.

name: Silhouette of Darkness
description: A medium sized medieval map with new textures, gameplay focuses largely on discovering secrets.

name: Marvel Super Heroes: War Of The Gems
description:
Thanos mounts the six Infinity Gems on his left glove to form the titular Infinity Gauntlet.
Each Gem grants its bearer complete mastery over one aspect of the universe: Time, Space, Mind, Soul, Reality, and Power.
Now all-powerful and desperate to win the affections of Death, Thanos decides to offer the entity a gift of love by completing a task she had given him, erasing half the sentient life in the universe (including most of the X-Men, Daredevil, and the Fantastic Four), quite literally with a snap of his fingers. The surviving heroes on Earth band together guided by the newly-resurrected Adam Warlock to battle Thanos.
In a bid to impress Death, Thanos allows the heroes a slight chance of winning. Can you save the universe?

A War Of The Gems fan game made with OpenBor.

name: Blackish House
description:
Those with individuality, good looks which help to bring this out, as well as talent — however, despite having all these things, none of them think about the other people around them, and are all ‘blackish’ personalities.

The agency they work for, SeiGetsu Production, notices this; gathering all these talents, they present them with a single condition.

Which is... for all of them to live together, cooperate with one another, and successfully produce a musical performance within half a year. If they fail, the agency will end all of their contracts, and make sure they can never be a part of the showbiz again.

Where they are forced to live is a run-down mansion that hardly suits these talented stars. The amount of time given to them is half a year. Gathered are all different kinds people — a mix of actors, dancers, seiyuu, singers, models. Furthermore, all of them possess rather ‘extreme’ quirks in their personalities.

Forced into the midst of this mess is the heroine, an actress who does not possess a ‘self.’ After half a year, what is it that the heroine and these other members, will see?

name: The Rest is Silence
description: Around medium Knave-style fortress. Requires the Lost Chapters pack.

name: Breakfast at Twilight
description: A knave-textured castle built upon scraps by Kell and Drew and the author's speedmap from SM93.

name: The Lost Levels
description: Classic singleplayer campaign made by Gotshun that was never finished or released: Two episodes with 16 levels of various themes including a start map and a secret map. The second episode lacks a conclusion/boss fight due to the unfinished nature of the pack, but it is perfectly playable.

name: Hexameron: Phase One
description: Very large, detailed, professionaly constructed Base map with a few outside areas and three new monsters (modified Enforcers, Scourge).

name: Caves, Canyons & Crevices
description: 14 SP maps set in or around canyons and caves. Two of them use custom skyboxes and a music track. The map sources are included.

name: Jump
description: Large dark medieval brick map in the vein of Honey and Func Map Jam 1. The map source is included.

name: Quake Condensed
description: Mini episode consisting of five small polished-up speedmaps, each following one of Quake's native texture themes.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Twin Mill (Unleashed Edition)
description: An icon of style and creativity. We're talking about Twin Mill, the legendary Hot Wheels twin-engine racing car, even cooler with the exclusive “Unleashed“ livery. Your collection can't miss this beauty!

name: Arabian Nights
description: An essential 3-map classic crafted in a sadlark-like egypt style.

name: For Love of Evil
description:
Three independent levels connected by a start map.
Voidscape: Very small rocky island floating in space.
Brownie: Small medieval fortress with an atrium and tower areas.
For The Love Of Evil: Large Metal/runic map with majestic halls and various traps. (On hard difficulty, the map exceeds the max_edicts limit, so it requires a source port with increased limits).

name: Sewage Devastation
description: A big green swampy sewage system. Build in short time in a speedmapping fashion.

name: Cappuccino: The Refill
description: Medium sized gothic fortress with Q3A textures (second version).

name: Sludge Factory
description: Two industrial/slime-themed maps with custom textures and horde-based combat: a large factory in a canyon and a small oil rig on an ocean of slime.

name: Dry Sorrow
description: Small medieval outpost with a unique texture theme and horde-based combat. A touched-up version of an old deathmatch map converted for SP mode. Comes with a custom skybox.

name: Fort Ratsack
description: A fast and frantic base map for Quoth.

name: Binding Tower
description: Large map with a castle in a dark forest. Comes with a custom skybox and the map source is included.

name: House of Spikes
description: Just like Biff's previous map imp1sp1 this one is a beauty.

name: The Corral
description: A beautiful base map that shines with graphical perfection. Gameplay is ok (only grunts and enforcers plus a few rotfish) and very straight-forward (no keys).

name: Well of Lost Souls
description: Small to medium-sized map inspired by E4M2- The Tower of Despair.

name: Unholy Ossuary
description: Medium-sized classic Episode 3-style runic level.

name: Civil War Strategy
description: A one or two player strategic level war game simulating the American Civil War. Play as either the Union or Confederacy - recruit/drill armies, fortify cities, choose commanders, send troops into battle, build navies, raid enemy commerce, and more.

name: Soul Falchion
description: Soul Falchion is a Game Boy Color fighting game developed by Vast Fame and released in 2002.

name: Murder at the Disco
description: Medium-sized nightclub level with several dancefloors, bars and VIP areas. Comes with an optional start map, a few external textures as well as a custom skybox, and some music tracks. The map source is included. This map requires the Malice TC.

name: Shifting Planes of Existence
description: Medium-sized Knave-style level with button-operated movable "planes". This is an updated version of the level. The map source is included.

name: Wrath of Ahnkii
description: Large Egyptian-style map. Comes with a custom skybox and a music track. The map source is included.

name: Aftershock for Quake
description: Aftershock for Quake, or simply Aftershock, is a commercial add-on for Quake developed by HeadGames Publishing, Inc. and published by GT Interactive. The add-on was released on November 10, 1996.

name: Barbican Of Hell
description: Small runic level. The map source is included.

name: Arcane
description: Medium sized Metal/runic level.

name: Wenl Mine
description: Large mine cavern map; a remake of the third level from Descent 2. Exploration-style gameplay and many secrets.

name: Dreary Disposition
description: Large Wizard-themed medieval castle/dungeon level. The map source is included.

name: Dinosaur King: Wake Up! New Power!
description:
The last entry of this arcade machine series, where you fight with dinosaurs with a rock, paper, scissors enhanced system.

This version concludes the story, by presenting how, after the defeat of Space Pirates, Jark's son, Goma, takes the leadership and tries once and for all the universal domination, and now, D-team has to stop him and his powerful ace, Eocarcharia.
This entry is special because it had more playable novelties of all the games, including 6 special critical move attacks which are quick time event moves, one per elemental type, and also another power up/gimmick, the awaken mode, in which, once you win or lose you can activate, being a One turn exclusive power up where your attack and defense is duplicated.

name: Cataractnacon & Zeangala
description: Two large abstract base levels, a lengthy journey through a non-linear H.R. Giger-themed flooded scrapyard. The map sources are included.

name: Myworld is Yourworld
description: Medium sized brick/metal map with a Shub boss fight at the end.

name: Jawbreak
description: Fairly large idbase map with a lot of button pressing.

name: The Underworld
description: Small Base map with an outdoor area.

name: War Church
description: Large, spacious military base/stronghold fortifying an old church. The map source is included.

name: Plowing Through
description: Large, spacious base map with industrial machinery. The map source is included.

name: Mayhem Pantera
description: Medium-sized moldy brick level inside a cave. It runs on the SMP mod (included). The map source is included.

name: Q.U.B.E. Ultimate Bundle
description:
A bundle including the complete versions of Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary and Q.U.B.E. 2 (packaged as Q.U.B.E. 2 Deluxe Edition on the Epic Game Store and Q.U.B.E. 2 + Season Pass on Steam).

Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is the ultimate celebration of the decade-old original, bringing refined visuals, completely redesigned and revised gameplay sections, and a whole new chapter to the award-winning, brain-twisting first-person puzzler. It features:

# Q.U.B.E. Original game (2012)
# Q.U.B.E. Director's Cut (2014)
# Over 100 puzzles to complete and 46 collectibles across 8 levels
# Sector 8, a new chapter featuring 4-6 hours of new gameplay
# Fresh visuals built from the ground up; full colour blind support
# Brand new commentary and assorted extras such as concept art and behind the scenes content.

Q.U.B.E. 2 Deluxe Edition gives players access to all released content including:

# The acclaimed Q.U.B.E. 2 Main Game
# Lost Orbit DLC with 10 new puzzle rooms, a final master puzzle and 32 collectibles to discover
# Aftermath DLC with 12 challenging new puzzle rooms, a master puzzle, brand new mechanics and 42 hidden collectibles across the map
# The iconic Glove Skin from the original Q.U.B.E.
# The incredible musical score of Q.U.B.E. 2 composed by David Housden.

name: The Subconscious Fear
description: Large 'techno-dungeon' with many corridors and ambushes.

name: The Citadel of Sinners
description: Very large fortress/citadel with many corridors and ambushes. Comes with a small skill selection map.

name: Seven
description: Small medieval level made in a classic style for vanilla Quake. Map source is included.

name: Citadel of Fire
description: Dark oldschool lava temple level, originally made in 2019.

name: Deepest Oblivion
description: Dark oldschool dungeon level, originally made in 2019.

name: Castle Puzzlefort
description: Small medieval / castle themed puzzle level with no enemies for vanilla Quake. Inspired by the Amiga game Castle Master. Also supports deathmatch. Map source is included.

name: Conflagrant Rodent
description: Large Medieval/terracotta-themed temple ruin in a canyon. High monstercount, hard gameplay. The texture resource wad is included.

name: The Katagean Redoubt
description: A big, interconnected, green-wizardish map with well thought-out secrets.

name: Death's Taste
description: Small Wizard castle.

name: Borderlands 3: Director's Cut
description: Director's Cut is the second "upgrade pack" released for Borderlands 3, including behind-the-scenes content and additional missions and items.

name: Final Fantasy II
description: The second game in the Dawn of Souls compilation for the Game Boy Advance released in 2004. This remake of the original Final Fantasy II has updated mechanics, a new playable scenario and a bestiary.

name: Open Ocarina
description:
Open Ocarina is a PC port of the decompiled The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time originally for the Nintendo 64.

It supports features such as 30-120 fps, free camera, rumble, gyro aim, and HD texture packs.

name: Hexle
description: A little number-guessing game inspired by Sudoku with hexadecimal numbers and binary restrictions, presented in a minimalist style. Infinite puzzles, daily challenges and weekly megaboards!

name: Paint-a'-Way
description: Paint-a'-Way is a platformer game where you use your brush to paint your way across different obstacles while avoiding the black skunky oil that lies in your way. Make your way to a colorful rift to continue your journey across yodie land.

name: Aquatic Pursuits Bundle
description:
Fishing Adventure is a typical fishing game, where the player can (drums) catch different fish species! Fish in USA, Hawaii and other unique fisheries.
Game is quite simple, designed to run even at older computers!

Aquarist:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

name: Underwater and Seafaring Duo
description:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea.
Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions. Assemble massive naval installations on open waters.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Volume 7
description: Dive into breathtaking adventures on three of the greatest Williams classics!

name: Waters & Fields Adventure Bundle
description:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Get ready for a logistic challenge in the next part of the best-selling series, which has been sold in over 120,000 copies! In Farm Manager 2022, as a farm manager, you have to ensure the right level of harvest, employee satisfaction, animal health, equipment efficiency and proper crop processing. You can buy new plots and use materials from abandoned buildings to expand your farm. Thanks to the new, more intuitive interface, employee management is even simpler.

name: Oceanic Discoveries Duo
description:
Aquarist:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Ship Graveyard Simulator:
Visit the largest ship graveyard in the world. A dozen kilometers of beach filled with wrecks. Hundreds of ships wrecked on the coast. Thousands of tons of steel. Choose the most valuable ship for you and start the adventure. Play as one of the workers during the most dangerous work in the world. Cut, hit, weld! Dismantle the whole ship and sell the obtained parts and upgrade your equipment.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2: Special Edition
description:
The Special Edition includes:
• Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2
• Super Pass
- Super Pack 1
- Super Pack 2
- Super Pack 3
- Super Pack 4
- Super Pass Bonus: Early access to the character Future Trunks from DRAGON BALL SUPER.
• HERO OF JUSTICE Pack Set
- HERO OF JUSTICE Pack 1
- HERO OF JUSTICE Pack 2

name: Water & Domestic Animals Bundle
description:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Animal Shelter Simulator grants you the opportunity to tackle the challenging but also highly rewarding task of running a refuge for strays and rescues. Witness firsthand how much effort goes into helping abandoned and injured animals as you handle a number of tasks necessary for your shelter to operate smoothly.

name: Pixel Paint 2: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Director's Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Knights & Guns: Diamond Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's Sing 2024 with International Hits: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Diamond Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's Sing 2024 with International Hits: Gold Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: City Parking Driver: Draw The Path Simulator
description: A parking simulator in which you need to draw a path and park your car avoiding all the obstacles!

name: Farmer Bundle
description: Farming has never been nicer!

name: Nyanzou & Kumakichi: Let's make a flower garden
description: Let's grow your favorite flowers

name: Dog
description: Looks like Ludo, but it's Dog. In this game, you also have to safely bring your four game pieces into your home area. The difference is that they are moved using cards that have a few surprises in store for you. Team spirit is important, because you can only win together.

name: Bog Man Has Had Enough
description:
Bog Man is tired of the noise up above and is ready to do something about it with the help of his faithful axe and trusty shotgun.
A 10-15 minute long Copper map about ascending from the bog and silencing the evil above.

name: Reload Map Jam
description: Map jam run by Slipgate Sightseer in cooperation with Reload Magazine, with the goal of picking 3 entries to write about in an article!​

name: Grisly Grottos
description: 10 speedmaps + start map inspired by e1m4 - The Grisly Grotto. Mappers had 60 hours to create a map using custom progs - based on Copper and featuring the diving gear from Dwell - with no restrictions on texturing or gameplay other than the prompt.

name: Tainted
description:
In your tainted land, an unfathomable cosmic horror takes root. Monstrous abominations sow chaos and despair, while the Rune of Power, pulsating with forbidden energies, is stolen. To restore harmony and repel doom, you must drive back the eldritch creatures and reclaim the Rune of Power...
8 Singleplayer maps made for Copper

name: Rotting Jam
description: Rotting Jam is a collection of seven maps created over a period of two weeks for Arcane Dimensions with the theme "Decay and disrepair".

name: Of Three Plantagenets
description: Three-map mini episode in a dark medieval theme. It has an extra start map and features a few modifications, some new sounds, models and textures.

name: The Hell That's Coming
description: Medium-sized medieval map with fairly linear gameplay and some monster modifications.

name: Symphony of Science
description: Medium-sized dark underground laboratory.

name: Infernal Ascent
description: Small to medium-sized vertical mixed-texture map.

name: The Grinding of Teeth
description: Small Metal level.

name: The Black Fog
description: Small cave tomb / temple map with Makkon textures, built for Arcane Dimensions v1.81+ (NOT included). Some textures and sounds from Thief: The Dark Project. Custom music by MrDetonia. Map source is included.

name: Time to Belong
description: Episode with four medium-sized classic id-themed maps + custom start and end map. Mostly vanilla Quake with a few extras, comes with its own progs.dat. Based on previously released speedmaps (details in included readme).

name: Prison of Hope
description: Large sci-fi gothic mountain prison for vanilla Quake inspired by Dark Souls, with textures by Makkon. Difficulty settings are not implemented. Map source is included.

name: Azure Moon
description: A large base-themed map inspired by Half-Life 1 / Black Mesa with a ton of blue and green lighting, hence the name. The author's first release.

name: Cold Light
description: Four (4) map episode with a variety of medieval / wizard / runic themes in a classic style, made for vanilla Quake. Some levels are rather non-linear and large. Map source is included.

name: What Lies Behind
description: Small metal/runic level. Comes with a custom music track from Quake64. The map source is included.

name: Lamphead
description: The protagonist of this game is a strange man who needs to breach out of the darkened and dangerous odd place at whatever cost.

name: Garden Buddies
description: Unleash your inner gardener and immerse yourself in the serene world of Garden Buddies, cultivating a vibrant flower garden alongside your new friend Mutsy.

name: Hentai Tales Vol. 1
description: Immerse yourself in fascinating tales, solve intriguing puzzles and enjoy the beauty of anime images.

name: Super Ultimate Fighters
description: The ultimate fighting game that brings together various fighters!

name: The Love: Date Simulator with Girls
description: Discover the power of words to shape your destiny in a game that celebrates the beauty of human connection!

name: The Legend of Shadow: Mask of the Force
description: Shadow action to collect the masks of power and take vengeance on the gods. Use the power of many masks of special skills to get stronger! Enjoy stylish shadow action!

name: Buddy Canine Ballcaster
description: In this platform game, you control Buddy, a ball-throwing dog who must rescue his brother from the evil goblin king and his minions.

name: Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzle Collection
description: Enjoy 600+ unique jigsaw puzzles across 5 different games. Experience high-quality images from various themes, such as: Nature, Art, Cities, Animals and so much more!

name: Turn-Based Bundle
description: Including five turn-based strategy games published by Goblinz!

name: Temporis Arts
description: Temporis Arts is Pretty Maniac Rhythm game with a circularly rotating Judgement Line! What you have to do in a spinning, sounding world is just - hit the notes in Tempo!

name: FeatherCall
description: FeatherCall is a fast pace, puzzle platformer where you help Luna, a mother blue bird, rescue her lost children. Brave numerous challenges and puzzles by Dashing to new heights, Throwing a guiding feather, and Gliding back to safety!

name: Narcalid
description: Explore a dangerous new world on your own or with up to three friends. Narcalid is a puzzle platformer emphasizing peaceful exploration, a compelling spiritual narrative, and out-of-this-world creatures. Can you open the gateway to Earth before the Narcalid mother becomes unstoppable?

name: Presence Lookout
description: Presence Lookout is an Observation spot the difference Horror game where the player has to spot different "anomalies" through the map. Anomalies can be anything from an object that has been moved to another location, rotated or even an unknown entity that shouldn't be. Report the Anomalies to win!

name: Fowl Damage
description: Fowl Damage is an atmospheric puzzle platformer where your default jump provides enough fall damage to destroy you! Carefully manage your jumps and falls as you adventure through this chilling, beautiful, and occasionally cute world.

name: The Westcoast Drive: Lowrider Simulator
description: Experience 1960s American lowrider culture. Customize your ride, hit the streets, and dominate with iconic hydraulics

name: Short Haired Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: AOA Academy
description: You found a letter from the A.O.A academy, claiming that you have been accepted into their academy. This surprised you, since you've never attempted to enroll in any academy. Not only that, this letter also contained the number of your old friend, Ashley. Determine to face your new future in AOA.

name: Blood & Chaos
description: Blood & Chaos is a roguelike tribute to the golden era of '80s RPG gaming. Create a fellowship of 6 heroes and embark on an epic journey. Explore a thriving world with quests to accomplish, cities to discover and dungeons to explore where your mastering of turn-based combats will keep you alive.

name: Block Strategy
description: Block Strategy is an RTS game where the world is made up of blocks that can be placed or destroyed to change the terrain. Gather materials by exploring or destroying enemies, and use them to expand your base and defend against an onslaught of enemies.

name: I's Long Night
description: A relaxed casual adventure game

name: The Phantom
description: The Ghost Who Walks is back! Comics' very first costumed hero is coming to Steam and console in an all new side scrolling beat-em-up adventure. Take on the Singh brotherhood across the globe with only your physical strength, skill with weapons and fearsome reputation!

name: Security Guy
description: Set up security measures to catch dastardly thieves red-handed. Investigate a variety of exciting, colorful locations and adapt your tools to their environments to persecute burglars with maximum efficiency.

name: Kamitsubaki City Regenerate
description: Answer the summons to the parallel world of "Kamitsubaki City" and meet a cast of colorful characters as you set out on a quest to save this city from the brink of destruction in this dark-fantasy sci-fi visual novel!

name: Furious Rage
description: Furious Rage is a linear 2D platformer about an unusual hero who finds himself in a strange place. Guide your character through dark locations and don’t let the monsters destroy you! All locations have doors that block your path and levers from them and enemies that will try to interfere.

name: The Tainted Land
description: 'The Tainted Lands' is a classic 2D turn-based RPG about an epic adventure in world of dark and eldritch horrors. As the last of an ancient order of Guardians, you must gather allies, explore the wilderness where the secrets of the past dark ages lie dormant, and slay the unspeakable horrors.

name: Regular Spacecraft: Defending the Mothership
description: Defeat the enemies. Upgrade the spacecraft. Defend the mothership. Regular Spacecraft - Defending the Mothership is a shoot em'up game with roguelite elements.

name: Naughty Queens
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Travelin'
description: Travelin' is a turn-based card game that will test your abilities to make the right decisions. Pack your skills and be prepared for the trials, tribulations and triumphs of a journey across Europe. Are you ready for this journey?

name: Girls And Robots 2
description: This game is an early Roguelike game. The world is lost to monsters and bugs. Players need to get out of the base through fighting, find the truth behind the monster attack, and save this "broken" world if possible.

name: Mad Sage
description: Mad Sage is a 2D action roguelike where you play as a bizarre sorcerer, go to the magical forest and calm the monsters. The forest is full of different types of monsters, for each enemy you need to find your own approach.

name: Bee Craft Sweet
description: Real-time simulation game of bees Can you survive?

name: I Feel Very Lonely and I Don’t Remember Myself
description: A short sci-fi visual novel about four scientists trapped in an underground lab. Explore their chat records to uncover the mysteries of Inturg Technologies. How can they escape their doom?

name: Woodside
description: Welcome to Woodside, a third-person survival horror adventure. Explore, investigate and survive as Grace as she comes face to face with the supernatural terrors that plague a seemingly quaint British village.

name: Norwegian Jigsaw Puzzles
description: "Explore Norway's beauty through captivating puzzles. From serene fjords to the Northern Lights, discover the magic of Norway!"

name: Grapples Galore: Cosmetics Pack 1
description: This bundle contains 7 very stylish hats and 3 (also very stylish) outfits for Grapples Galore. You Must Own Grapples Galore

name: DaemonClaw: Origins of Nnar
description: Defend humanity from a surprise attack by the mystical creatures of the world of Nnar in this high speed arcade/console style action game coming to modern and classic retro platforms.

name: Music Power Up
description: As a musician in the 1980s, create music for early video games. Make your own sounds and melodies from scratch, or use pre-composed patterns. Play games, upgrade the music app, meet programmers, editors and musicians, find your next music job, in the crazy decade that started the digital revolution.

name: Cosmic Clash
description: Battle your friends for space superiority in this arcade style space shooter. Select your star fighter and jump into Cosmic Clash where you try and eliminate your friends while surviving the perils of space.

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Episode 2
description: A challenging Classicvania game with an instant death - infinite respawn mechanic (and an "easy" mode). It's tactical: you need to understand each challenge, and time your moves for perfect execution. Easy to learn but hard to master. It's about Vlad the Impaler, the real medieval Dracula.

name: Roll The Bones
description: Select spell-dice for your loadout, roll them and wreak absolute havoc! This high-paced pixelart roguelite will let you build unique loadouts with extremely interactable spells. Let's roll some bones!

name: Stylish Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Night Fear
description: Night Fear is a fast-paced roguelike where you play as a brave knight, the last of a line of liberators. Use the best weapons and skills to defeat enemy units and not die in a dark dungeon. You must give it your all, collect the best weapons, complete all levels of the dungeon and stay alive!

name: Sut
description: A cute 2D platformer where you stick to walls and fight your way out of a hot fireplace. Features environment-based combat and a cozy, retro aesthetic.

name: Sweet Beauties
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy.

name: Powerful Dabl
description: Powerful Dabl is an action roguelike, find yourself in a snowy location, go through corridors filled with enemies, and only by destroying all the monsters can you move forward!

name: The Clown's Forest 3: Haunting Apparitions
description: On a cold snowy night on December 17th 2011... David discovered his son missing and vowed to look for him around Hartown Park. But his desperate search ends in misery.

name: Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream
description: Teenagers, Dreams, and Drugs. Unveil the secrets of South Jayakarta city, set two years after the ending of the original Troublemaker. The journey of the “Parakacuk” gang continues alongside the “Beyond Dream” band in South Jayakarta city in this fun open-world action-comedy beat-'em-up game.

name: Lost Princess: Winterland
description: Play this walking simulation. Lost princess are again missing. Collect items and try to find missing Princess in big open snow world

name: Footy Bash
description: Step into the world of Footy Bash, Experience the rush of fast-paced football with 1-4 players. Unleash spectacular speckys to leave your opponents in awe and land devastating hits to thrill your fans. With dynamic gameplay and a classic look, Footy Bash is an electrifying footy spectacle.

name: Running Crazy
description: I have been waiting for you for a long time. The beauties are waiting for you at the finish line. Run!

name: Hentai Midori
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Watch
description: Sin descripción

name: Boki: The Summit
description: Boki is a Metroidvania, Choose your own adventure, Precision platformer in which you play as a young mountain goat, who must climb a mountain in seek of revenge. Dodge, battle and fluidly maneuver through several uniquely crafted areas and biomes and uncover the secrets of a tyrannical kingdom.

name: Astral Tale
description: "ASTRAL TALE"- Myth of the Stars," a classic Japanese MMORPG, is now officially operating worldwide. A brand-new profession has been introduced, allowing players to embark on a unique journey across the stars together!

name: Serpens: Eternal Thievery
description: Serpens: Eternal Thievery is an immersive first-person stealth game where you embody Anika, a thief gifted with the power to loop back in time. With this unique ability and your arsenal of weapons, you must explore treacherous places, fight challenging enemies, and keep to the shadows.

name: Quest Giver
description: You're an NPC who gives quests to heroes. Play through 7 scenarios in this humorous narrative adventure with management sim gameplay and a real sassy manager. Now get to work!

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Widow's Walkabout
description: Widow's Walkabout is the decaying, Victorian manor on the cliff that you've been waiting to sneak into—with haunted mini golf, eerie surprises, and hints to a secret story around every shadowy corner! Putt your way through mesmerizing mechanics and unending curiosities… if you dare!

name: From Space: Mission Pack - Molten Iron
description: Mission Pack: Molten Iron is a DLC for From Space that will take your Horde Mode experience to the next level. Ramp up your gameplay with the addition of 2 new maps (Crucible and Steelworks), a weapon (Plasma Shotgun), 2 items (Bear Trap and Napalm Mine), and a perk (Protective Coveralls).

name: From Space: Mission Pack - Concrete Jungle
description: Mission Pack: Concrete Jungle is a DLC for From Space that will take your Horde Mode experience to the next level. Ramp up your gameplay with the addition of 2 new maps (Skyline and Hospital), a weapon (Medic Gun), 2 items (Decoy Soldier and Ice Maker), and a perk (Resurrection Perk).

name: Star Trek: Infinite - Designing the Galaxy
description: Like many crews before us, we have documented our voyage for posterity. Explore the birth of Star Trek: Infinite from concept to completion with a 70-page artbook!

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Vol.5 Customs Pack
description: Pack your Garage with 3 new, exclusive Custom Builds: Chevrolet Corvette Grand Sport (2017), BMW i8 Coupé (2018), & Mercedes-AMG C 63 Coupe (2018).

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Trick or Street Swag Pack
description: Make an entrance with the new Trick or Street Swag Pack, containing a one-off Legendary Custom clothing pack inspired by the golden age of American animation, a Skeleton Head mask, a driving effect, & more.

name: Need for Speed Unbound: Volkswagen Beetle (1963) - Legendary Custom Pack
description: Be notorious & show people why you're at the top of the scene in the Legendary Custom Volkswagen Beetle (1963). Alongside the ride, enjoy a 10-level Speed Pass boost.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Halloween
description: Ryan needs help to makeover his Hallway for Halloween! Can you help him make the perfect spooky room?

name: Revenge of Banana
description: Revenge of Banana is a fast paced FPS game, one damage and you're dead! You have to kill the enemy with your swift moves, dodge a Strawberry trying to hit you, a Watermelon throwing seeds at you and an Exploding Tomato!

name: Board Games
description: Presenting the "Timeless Board Game Bundle" - a delightful compilation of three iconic and universally cherished board games that have stood the test of time.

name: Deep Loot
description:
Deep Loot is an oceanic explore-’em up. There's loot, deadly sea creatures and secrets to be found. On-the-fly procedural content means you can explore the ocean in every direction without limits and without waiting.

There are hundreds of unique loot items to find as well as equipment and upgrades to spend your profits on. Soon you'll be zapping the denizens of the deep with white-hot plasma as you plunder ancient ruins for legendary treasures, well on your way to becoming the world's greatest Deep Looter!

name: World Cup '98 France: Road to Win
description:
World Cup '98 France: Road to Win, not to be confused with FIFA Road to World Cup 98 is a football game released for the Sega Saturn.

World Cup '98 France recycles its core engine and much of its content from earlier Sega-published football games, particularly Sega Worldwide Soccer 98.

This is the last Saturn football game whose lineage can be traced back to 1995's Victory Goal. The next game in the series, Sega Worldwide Soccer 2000 was built from the ground-up by Silicon Dreams for the Dreamcast.

name: Rushdown Rivals Reloaded
description: Take on the robot hordes of Rushdown Rivals from a different perspective! Fight through the city streets in this hectic arcade shooter inspired by Time Crisis and House of the Dead!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - AcceleRacers All-Star Pack
description: AcceleRacers fans please welcome 4 super stars! The futuristic Carbide, the 4-wheeled nightmare RD-09, the high-speed SUV Rollin' Thunder and the hybrid racing car SpecTyte. Add the AcceleRacers All-Star Pack to your collection now!

name: KillJoy
description:
Do you remember what Pray 2 should be when it was just announced?
That's right - the game about the bounty hunter: clapping:
Actually a project about a mercenary who helps order protectors in putting things in order, cleaning out the criminal rot from the most provincial corners of Dirty City.

name: Successor to Your Throne
description: In this short character-focused narrative experience you are a monarch of a small medieval kingdom and must name your successor before it is too late.

name: Project RyMe
description: Project RyMe is a story-focused puzzle adventure where you take on the role of a young woman investigating her father's disappearance. Use your computer hacking skills to investigate the internet and an odd, old computer to solve a mystery that deepens at every turn.

name: Dead Man's Quest
description: Hey, you! Welcome to the island of Pequena! ️ Dead Man's Quest is a narrative hand-tracking and puzzle short story and technical demonstration, lovingly wrapped in a light-hearted and quirky pirate theme!

name: Plants vs. Zombies Plus
description: Do you think Plants Vs. Zombies is too easy? There definitely are some people that believe it's way too easy, to the point one person created a mod for the game, massively increasing its difficulty with some balance changes thrown in. It is known as Plants Vs. Zombies Plus.
